#### Biostatistics Bootcamp 
##### Co-Instructor  
<br/>

##### Course Description  

Week-long "warm-up" required for incoming M.S. students and recommended for incoming Ph.D. students. Topics cover calculus, R, probability, descriptive statistics and data visualization, multiple random variables, matrix algebra and topics in programming.

##### Role

With lead instructor [Sam Morrison](https://www.sammorrisonstats.com/), I revised materials from the previous year's bootcamp and split teaching days.
